website_summaries.verdict: Although some quality control concerns have been noted, this is a good choice for aspiring scientists who love to watch plants grow.
pros: Includes everything needed to grow living plants, including soil, seeds, and a lighted terrarium jar
Comes with stickers and characters so youngsters can customize their miniature container gardens
cons: A few terrariums arrived with missing pieces, and some had "dud" seeds
Light has been known to quit working

customer_reviews.title: Special needs students interacting with the terrarium for our classroom garden theme.
customer_reviews.text: We loved it! We are a special needs school in Warren, Michigan. Our special needs students took turns with adaptive switches, devices, pictographs, etc to communicate and request and respond. The tactile items were great for our VI students. Looking forward to watching it grow within our classroom with our “little explorers.”
customer_reviews.author: Jule A Nolta

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for 5+ year old
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality kit for children. All contents are exactly as described. Perfect grandparent gift and project. Highly recommend. Our grasses haven't grown yet - will update pictures.
customer_reviews.author: pcgk

customer_reviews.title: A gift other than electronics for those growing minds
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my great grandson and he loves it. He had received a sunflower seed packet and it never grew so he wanted to grow something. This was very easy to put together and he saw immediate results. If you're looking for a project that doesn't involve TV or video games this is a great one.
customer_reviews.author: CURRIE

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my 9 year old Granddaughter. She ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 year old Granddaughter. She was able to do it all by herself and loves checking on it each day. There was growth by day 3 so you don't have to wait too long.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lazaroff

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute activity. Our three year old loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 3 year old!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great activity for my 3 year old! The spray bottle that comes with it is perfect for little hands, making it very easy for him to water the plants. The seeds started to grow after just one day. The decorations and stickers that came with it are adorable and my son loved them. Definitely recommend this to any age child! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: He was so happy! In less than a week the grass was ...
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old received this for his birthday and within 2 days he saw sprouts. He was so happy! In less than a week the grass was coming through the lid. Great product for kids to do!
customer_reviews.author: R Bo

customer_reviews.title: No seeds in box
customer_reviews.text: Imagine Christmas morning your child opens this and is excited. Sets it all up and their are no seeds in the box!!! Where do I even buy seeds to put in this thing!! Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Beale

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter (age 6) loves to plant and watch things grow so I thought this would be a perfect Christmas gift. She assembled it with my guidance. The pictures on the ad is misleading. We didn't have near enough blue sand to make a good looking layer. The spray bottle broke before she could get the first layer of soil damp and the removeable stickers were missing. The seeds did begin to grow after 2-3 days. I guess we will see if the night light lasts longer than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It was also fun to design the terrarium
customer_reviews.text: The plants grew within a few days!! Very cute idea to teach you child how to care for a plant that has low maintenance. It was also fun to design the terrarium!! Includes plenty of extra seeds to replant if you lose any.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't get this
customer_reviews.text: It didn't light up....and the plants never grew. My daughter liked planting it and decorating it.....but was very disappointed when we got done and it didn't light up, and nothing grew
customer_reviews.author: Kelilynmiles

customer_reviews.title: Cool Nightlight too!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter’s 8th birthday and she loved setting it up. Her favorite thing about it is the light up feature - makes a cool nightlight!
customer_reviews.author: Constance Wellik

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for any child
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my 7 year old nephew. It was his favorite birthday present. His 5 year old brother liked it so much that I got one for him, too. As soon as they wake up in the morning, they check its progress and they do the same when they get home from school. It’s like their little pet, but without the mess. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Grows mold
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this! I purchased as a Christmas present for my child and its full of mold! Horrible! I'm disappointed I missed the return window or I would have returned it!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: could grow mold inside
customer_reviews.text: I like it being kids friendly; what I don't like it is that it could grow mold inside. Hand to stop the science experiment with my daughter and throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: GoodMay

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR KIDS!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids, ages 3, 5 & 7 absolutely loved and still love this kit. The seeds grew quickly and I'm not sure how faithful they were with watering once they took it home, but they say the 'plants' are growing. Definitely buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: Jack beveridge

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool Product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 8 year old daughter for Christmas and she was thrilled to open it and set it up. Now the plants are growing very well and she is excited to see the growth each day. Thanks for making a great product that teaches children about plants and allows them to see them grow.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffry Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Junk? Or Defective?
customer_reviews.text: Really was excited abt this for my 5 year old but unfortunately the item i received was either defective or the product itself is junk. To begin with after putting everything in the terrarium we went to put lid on but would not line up properly so it was not easy to get on or off making it impossible for my child to do it alone. Then after abt 4 mo of use the charging port fell off inside the lid not by anyones fault but the cheap way it was made. Sadly I’ll probably just throw it away. Definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rob P.

customer_reviews.title: A unique idea to inculcate plant care and gardening to children
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my friend's son. Here is the feedback which I received from the birthday boy and his parents: Its unique idea to inculcate plant care and gardening to children as well as boost their creativity. The instructions are very clear and easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Akash Srivastava

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: The idea is great and could serve as a great gift. Unfortunately, the box I received missed the most important part-- the seeds themselves. When I reached out about this, I received no answer to my inquiry... Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my daughter for Easter and she loved putting it together and planting the seeds
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for Easter and she loved putting it together and planting the seeds. She was worried it wouldn't grow but it did and now the grass is taller than the container it came in. Great product and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Maxson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for Small Gardeners!
customer_reviews.text: This light up terrarium is perfect for our 7 year old who loves gardening. She immediately assembled it with a little help and began coordinating all of the layers, seeds and delightful accessories. She keeps it in a sunny spot and checks it out every day to see if any growth is happening. The glow in the dark feature is great! This has got to be one of the best, most creative (and most reasonable) gifts we've ever given her! THANK YOU!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen E. Raimondi

customer_reviews.title: Good idea for STEM but the execution fell short
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my kid. She decided use it for a show and tell. It was very well received. We also had a great time working together. The reason I gave this a three star is because I was not happy with the lid. The lit doesn’t fit well and cannot be screwed on tight. The container fell while she tried to carry it and dirt spilled everywhere. My kid was upset and we had to start the project over again. I was also puzzled as to why the lit has star shaped holes. A true terrarium is supposed to be fully enclosed to trap the liquid inside so it doesn’t need to be regularly watered.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Cute but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable! My son and I had a great time putting it together and watching the seeds grow. It only took a few days for the taproots to show, and within two weeks, we had to trim the grass. Unfortunately, the USB port for the light broke loose and there is no way to fix it myself. This was not due to roughness as I plugged it in myself every night. Since we got this for my son for Christmas, purchasing it in November, there was no way to return it or ask for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa & Robert Sanborn

customer_reviews.title: Started off promising
customer_reviews.text: I’m so sad! I got two of these for two granddaughters. One came from Florida to visit and the other lived here in a winter climate. Both terrariums started off quickly but the one here died off in 3 days!😟 the other is now back in Florida growing very slowly. None look like the pretty pictures of full growth as shown. Both girls were so excited and didn’t overwater them, but now they want to pour them out and start over with new stones and seeds hoping for better results😩
customer_reviews.author: Mother Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these for my son last year for Christmas. He kept it going well into summer until our cat knocked it off the windowsill. He asked for one again this year. I love that it has a light that you’re able to leave on in the evening! He loves that the stickers are removable and moveable. It was sprouting within 24 - 36 hours of being planted. He enjoys taking pictures of the sprouts day by day to compare them over time. This is a gift he could receive over and over and still get hours of enjoyment from.
customer_reviews.author: AlyssaAmmo

customer_reviews.title: Fun, easy, educational
customer_reviews.text: Simple, easy to put together and use. 5 year old put everything together and waters with the spray bottle every day like clockwork. Terrarium was spouting up withing 3 days, you can see the roots growing below the surface of the soil, and only grew and grew from there. The ease of putting it together and satisfaction of seeing it sprout and grow so quickly have made it a huge hit. Fun and educational. Great product, will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tif

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size & amount of time...
customer_reviews.text: for 9-year-old to stay attentive/excited. She enjoyed this project. The only thing she was bummed about was that there was very little blue rock -- as in not at all like the picture. But the seeds grew very nicely -- so much so we had to take the top off they got so tall!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my 7 year old daughter. The instructions were very clear to set up and she was able to do it on her own with a little guidance. The plants started growing by day 2 and grow so much daily that it makes it really exciting for her. This will help encourage her when we start an indoor garden this spring. She said this was her favorite Christmas present!
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: So Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! This set up is adorable and an extra bonus that it has a light (rechargeable). I had high expectations between the cost and other reviews I read. We gave this as a gift to our son, followed the instructions exactly and it was a total dud. Not one seed sprouted.
customer_reviews.author: SZ

customer_reviews.title: Rechargeable, easy to put together, and giftable!
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever really write reviews, but I can't help but write one for this product. I got the Terrarium Kit as a project for my son and I during COVID 19. I figured it would be fun to do something together and just bring a bit of green grass into our NYC apartment. I was expecting a lot less, but we definitely got our moneys worth. It was easy to put together, the rechargeable LED light is great; perfect as a night light. I would recommend the product as a gift for any 5-7 year old.
customer_reviews.author: MyssNg

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 5 and loves trying to grow things...mommy doesn't have a green thumb and things never grow. This was so easy to do with him ( he loved the step by step guide) and it was growing the very next day!!!!! And kept growing daily to the point that we had to keep the lid off!!! So much fun to do together and an amazing gift♡
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Jo

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My son was very excited about putting this together! It's very cute, and he likes that it lights up. There were only a couple of things that I thought were odd or could be better, like the amount of soil that came vs how much it tells you to use, and it was kind of difficult getting the seeds into the soil after the decorative rocks were in place. It's only been a day since we put it all together, but we are excited to see how it grows!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea for kids of different ages
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a gift for my son's 4th birthday and he absolutely loves it! He loved putting it together and getting to design it himself. He also enjoys watering his plants daily with the included mister and watching his plants grow. It is just about time to trim his plants and it's barely been a week.
customer_reviews.author: fay

customer_reviews.title: Very fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was a little smaller than expected, and I didn't have high hopes as we were putting it together. But I have to say, as soon as those little seeds started growing my kids were more than thrilled! It's been a fun little project for my 3 & 5 year old. They take turns watering it, and like to watch the it grow. I would recommend this for anyone looking for a gift for a child.
customer_reviews.author: chrystalb

customer_reviews.title: Cute but very cheap
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this for my son but was very disappointed when it arrived. The container is very cheap, the single tiny light inside is not very bright, the lid is extremely difficult to get on and off the container, the light only lasts about 3 hours if unplugged, the cord for the light is only about 18" long so unless you plan to keep in on a counter plugged in, or run an extension cord to it, dont bother. It was a cute concept but not well executed.
customer_reviews.author: Bsiren

customer_reviews.title: We will review in around 10 days.
customer_reviews.text: The child intended for this gift has not opened her gift yet. She shares Christmas vac as tion w/her father & mother in a shared custody divorce. The grains were coming out as we wrapped it. Not good. Hope it doesnt continue.
customer_reviews.author: E. Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Christmas for my grandson who is 4. With the virus "shelter-in-place" my daughter finally got a chance to take this out and work with him. My 2 yr old granddaughter helped. They took turns putting the ingredients together and sent me a picture. It sits on the window sill in the grandson's bedroom. The kids loved putting it together. Makes a great gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: He loved it! It was a gift and was super easy to grow and take care of. It went everywhere with him, until he got scared by a sudden animal and it flew through the air... The plant died but most of the container survived. Sad day for the little guy, he didn't have his "plampa" anymore.
customer_reviews.author: McDader

customer_reviews.title: Kiddo loves it 6 months later
customer_reviews.text: My almost 4 year old loves this. Everything grew and died (over several months) but she still loves it, adds rocks, uses it as a night light on occasion. She got more connected to it then I expected. We were thinking it would just be a few weeks of engagement for our 3 year old at xmas.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!  Amazing Sellers!
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect gift for my five year old grandson! He enjoyed creating the the habitat and watching it grow! Within a few days of watering, he began to see sprouts! Now we study the roots and measure the growth! When the item came, the lightning cable did not stay in the lid. I contacted the company and Rachel sent a new lid immediately! Great company! Now it lights up and my grandson sleeps by the light of his efforts!
customer_reviews.author: lori enzenroth

customer_reviews.title: Good sized and fun Terrarium!
customer_reviews.text: This was fun for my daughter to put together and it is much larger than expected. Easy to assemble and so far fairly easy to grow although it would have been helpful to know exactly how many seeds to use. It didn't say and I think we may have used too many.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Whinihan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 6 year old's birthday
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift! We gave it to a 6 year old who lives in a family of plant growers, and he was thrilled. He ignored other things going on around his birthday while he set it up (with a iittle adult help) and got it going. Five days ater sprouts have started. Plan to buy another of these for more upcoming age-appropriate birthdays. Thanks so much
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Seeds Not Included
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was excited to put this gift together - we assembled kit only to realize that no seeds were included. Additionally, the thin plastic lid did not fit securely on the jar. Very disappointing, cheaply made and a complete waste of money due to missing seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect project!!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot rave enough about this terrarium kit! My 4 year old grandson loved planting the seeds and adding stickers, etc. This kit provides everything you need to make a successful project. Seeds sprouted quickly and gives enjoyment every day.
customer_reviews.author: Patty W.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for granddaughter!!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter just turned 5 and we wanted to give her something she could not only enjoy for an extended period of time but also something she could learn from and enjoy watching. She and her mother put everything together and it is now in her room where she is waiting patiently (maybe not) for it to start growing. Thanks for such a creative idea!
customer_reviews.author: T B Hewell

customer_reviews.title: This was a favorite gift to my 9 year old son this Christmas
customer_reviews.text: This was a favorite gift to my 9 year old son this Christmas. It is adorable and the attention to detail to make sure the instructions are clear and easy was very much appreciated. It is just adorable and the grass started to grow exactly as it said (in about 5 days). I highly recommend this as a gift for a boy or girl. Your child will be capable of doing the entire thing on their own, which is great!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a really fun, entertaining, and educational gift for my son. I'm really impressed with the whole setup, and I love that my son runs to it each day to see the progression of his "plants". They only took three days to start sprouting. The aesthetics of the unit is nice too, it fits in nicely with my other house plants and I love that my cats can't chew on it! I ended up buying two more in different styles. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Boas

customer_reviews.title: My 7-year old loves this
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my 7-year-old daughter. After opening all of her gifts on Christmas morning, this was the first thing she wanted to open. With the help of her 9-year-old brother, she assembled it herself in about 15-20 minutes. The instructions were straightforward and accessible to children. The only hiccup was that the stickers did not stick to the glass, so she had to attach them with scotch tape. Overall a great gift, and my child was happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Joanovarq

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome!!! I want to buy another one. My 5 and 8 year old had a blast putting this together and decorating it. It was EASY to assemble. Only a few days later the grass started growing! There is a lot in there now! My kids are so proud of it. Definitely a great gift for a child!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing seed packet
customer_reviews.text: The seeds were missing from the unit that I sent to my little great grand son.... the second one that I received at my home was complete. Would like to have the seeds sent for the first unit to the Tennessee address
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my grandson. He is into growing things this summer, plants and raising butterflies . I opened the box and checked it for safety. I was impressed. The plastic terrarium was well made and so were the accessories. It will be attractive when set up.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Fun activity! Makes great gift.
customer_reviews.text: My 7yr old son got this for Christmas this year. He loved putting the kit together with all the colorful layers and mini figurines and stickers. He is now eagerly awaiting to see the fruits of his labor! 😉. It’s an adorable kit and a fun science activity. Gonna add this to our list of bday gifts to give to their friends. It’s only been two days and the connection port on the lid seems to be broken. So it won’t hold the usb connect. Are you able to resend a new lid?
customer_reviews.author: PalominoMom

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Cute concept, but it’s grass. Fairly certain the photo depicts something that is not grass.
customer_reviews.author: LINDSEY W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my 4 year old! The seeds grow well and quickly (even after my son dropped it and we had to start over). The LED light is great for him to keep it in his room. He loves to get up each day and see the progress and water them 🤓. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: BrianC

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kids since they are interested in plants and how they grow. They had fun putting it together and have been watering them and taking care of them. I think these are great at teaching responsibility along with how a plant grows.
customer_reviews.author: E Morton

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift.  Can’t give a total review yet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my soon to be 6 year old grandson. It arrived on time and looks great, but until his birthday, I will not really know how to rate it. I am sure he will love it. I will review it more at a later date. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: B Waite

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, Affordable, and Quarantine Activity at it's Best!
customer_reviews.text: This product came within the allotted time frame and arrived in the packaging as shown. I was extremely happy to receive an email from the company once they shipped the teranium stating how excited they were for me and that they knew I would enjoy it. Well, my 12yo daughter was so excited and her plants are already starting to grow. The directions are easy for her to read and follow along and she was able to get started with minimal supervision. Every day she comes downstairs with excitement on what the plants look like! Thank you Dan&Darci!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 8 year old who loves it. Seeds have sprouted. Easy to put together and operate. Great customer service. Thinking that there was something wrong with the light, I contacted the seller who was quick to respond and offered to send a replace. Turns out it was operator error and no replacement was necessary. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Otraba

customer_reviews.title: Quarantine fun in learning
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my granddaughter. She is eight, she told me it was easy to put together and directions were easy to understand. This is a good and fun way to stay motivated during quarantine. She has to take pictures and journal the progress of the plants.
customer_reviews.author: Missp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this to my friend's 7 year old daughter, for her birthday. She loved it! He is in landscaping so this will be a bonding thing for them, getting stuff to grow. Came on time, and in perfect condition. Thank you for an awesome fun and educational product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute science for the forced home schooling - Covid 19,2020
customer_reviews.text: My newly seven year old enjoyed making this. Made it a science lesson. What do plants need to sustain life etc. Watched Brainpop videos and answered those questions too. I took one star because it was a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nephew for his 6th birthday and he is obsessed! It was super easy for him to figure out with a little guidance from his dad. It was probably his favorite gift he received for his birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit! My son and I have had a great time assembling it and watching the plants grow. The kit comes with great directions. The plants grew, as promised, within three days. My son and I were so excited!
customer_reviews.author: YorkieLover

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our sons 7th birthday. He loved it! Unfortunately our dog got to it and ripped it apart on day 2. I tried to salvage what was left and found some of the sprouting seeds! I replanted them and am hoping they keep growing. It really is such a cute gift! Just keep it in a spot that your dogs can’t get to it! Lesson learned!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Heiser

customer_reviews.title: Good educational toy
customer_reviews.text: Used it as a gift item for 4 yo kids. The kids as well as parents loved it. It has light which adds more interest for the kids. The kids had a blast putting everything together. A good learning toy
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShoppingalways

customer_reviews.title: Buy your child something original!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my nephew. He has every toy you can imagine. I wanted to buy him something that wouldn’t be found at every kids store out there. I scored when I bought this for him. He loves it! He’s the curious type. I.E. mini electric sets, marble mazes, and anything else that actually is an intelligent toy. This checked all boxes. Obviously too early for anything to grow- but he was super happy and was looking forward to having his own terrarium! Must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Fun Project For Kids
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the terrarium for my seven year old granddaughter as a project to keep her engaged during the current Corona Virus crisis. My granddaughter and daughter-in-law enjoyed assembling it over this past weekend. I have also been informed that the garden has started to grow. It's a great project to keep kids occupied, especially during the current isolation situation.
customer_reviews.author: BobF

customer_reviews.title: You need a USB adapter ..wonderful kit
customer_reviews.text: My grandson opened this and immediately put it together. Then we saw that you need a USB adapter. We didn't know why you needed that. He remembered where there was one however and got it so we could get it turned on. Not bad for a 5 yr. old. Works great. Awesome gift. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Becatha

customer_reviews.title: The Terrarium kit was for a friends daughter and she ...
customer_reviews.text: The Terrarium kit was for a friends daughter and she absolutely loves it and is very excited a bout having it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great at home science project!
customer_reviews.text: My 4-1/2 year old grandson had the beat time putting together. It was a great at home science project this pandemic. Within days we had sprouts which really excited him.
customer_reviews.author: Dlatham

customer_reviews.title: 8th Birthday, Grandson very happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: All schools closed; remote learning, and no baseball (due to Coronavirus.) Perfect activity!! Our 8 year old Grandson really enjoyed putting this together, spraying it with water, putting in sunshine and watching it grow! It was growing in first week.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M S

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old loves!!
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 year old loves it. We had fun putting it all together. We water it every night and within couple days, it started to sprout and grow. Only issue is the led light goes out very fast. Doesn't last throughout the night. Need to charge everyday or keep it plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: ej3ooj

customer_reviews.title: Grandson ( and Granddaughter ) Loved their Terrarium!
customer_reviews.text: Let’s just say this is a great gift for mom and son to bond with seeing as dad and son have so much to bond with already! Great way to learn responsibility by making sure to water and recharge the light. Everything needed was included. Just might get our grandson to help with mom’s garden projects too.
customer_reviews.author: Yolander

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a Christmas gift for my child. I followed instructions and the Terrarium never grew. I waited a few months and purchased a replacement pack from Amazon, assuming maybe it was user error the first time. The photo I attached is the replacement after 2 months of attanetion. This product is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Such a great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved this product! It was easy to put together and now the seeds are sprouting! I’ll definitely order this again. The seller was kind to email me about the product and how they could help if something was missing and how they were grateful we bought something from their business, something that is very rare now a days and honestly that is something I appreciate and makes a big difference on my book. Trust me, make the purchase you won’t regret it one bit!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen S.

customer_reviews.title: outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: this item is already (after just a few days) the favorite object of the little girl it was purchased for. it was easy to assemble, easy to care for and a delight daily.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Xmas gift hit!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift for a 5 year old and he had a blast putting it together. It was easy for me to assemble the larger plastic part and he had a ton of fun with the stickers and decorations. The sprouts are sprouting and he’s taking about getting a bigger one already.
customer_reviews.author: E. Pettit

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for something fun for me and my bf (we're both 30 lol) to do at some point, and it was a fun little activity to do. Would be great for kids! The instructions were clear and easy to follow, and the kit contained everything you need, even the spray bottles to water the plants each day. it's not a huge terrarium, about 6" tall by 3-3.5" wide if I had to guess, so easy to maintain and doesn't take up too much counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got for my daughters 6th birthday and she loved putting it together! My 2 year old son even knocked it over shortly after being out together but it’s still growing perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this as a Christmas gift for an intellectually gifted younger child and it is perfect for her. I have assembled it but have not grown anything yet because it is not yet Christmas. I would definitely recommend it for children up to 10 years old and for adults that love something unique and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H. Blount

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a 6 year old girl. For the price, I expected a larger package. It appears to be of good quality though and it's nice it includes a light. I just expected the gift to be more substantial for $30.
customer_reviews.author: Janellemp

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 8 yr. old granddaughter and she loved it! The process of putting it all together and arranging the bunny and other items was a lot of fun and she also likes the light. It is so cute and the quality is very good .... I would recommend this to any little nature lover! Actually looks better in person.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my six-year-old nephew for Christmas. It was the hit out of all of the gifts. Even the adults said that they would like one!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Davini

customer_reviews.title: great gift and veryy easy set up, kitten approved.
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to a 16yo for christmas and she was able to fix it up within an hour. Cats are pretty interested in it when the light is on, so the light is pretty bright and clear. Base is pretty sturdy, viewing area is pretty large. Price is great, in case it gets destroyed by kittens. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a kid
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for our 5-year-old daughter! Out of all her Christmas gifts, she was most interested in this one. The assembly has led her to really be interested in the end result. We are so happy we found it!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set-Up
customer_reviews.text: great little fun terrarium. Easy to set up and it gives you about an hour fun play with the kids. Exciting for the kids to see the plants come up which will happen in just a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My grandson is happy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson who is 5 years old was watching YouTube Kids and saw them working on a project like this. I bought this for him and he was super excited once he got the package. His grandfather read the directions to him and it was easy for him to put together and he had a great time. I would recommend this Terrarium. It's a great way to teach our kids/grandkids how to grow and take care of plants
customer_reviews.author: Allana Clarke

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift.....
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter so I can’t say much about the product itself. She did seem excited and her mom is looking forward to helping her get it set up. All the pieces were there and it was colorful and nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: My grandson and I had so much fun setting up our terrarium and watching the little plants grow. He learned a lot about the life cycle of plants. This is great for a family activity.
customer_reviews.author: Criss K. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gift
customer_reviews.text: We had bought 2 of these terrariums for our 2 grand sons. They both loved it and were enthralled with them when they set them up and saw the light. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Weber🌷

customer_reviews.title: Creative innovative fun full—Easy
customer_reviews.text: This delightful educational gifts are for 10year old twins who will share with other kids who may not be able to afford them. Wonderful sharing—thanks😃
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little indoor garden
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our son’s 6th birthday. He wasn’t too excited at first, but the idea of watching his garden grow took off. He now shows it off to all his friends and is super proud of it. Very neat!
customer_reviews.author: Hanalee

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Its actually for my granddaughters bday in august, so i only peeked inside to make sure not broken. Looks good, but wont know more until end of Aug. Email me then and i will let you know more. Sorry. Came quickly and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertiesed
customer_reviews.text: Great little gift. Just don't let your kids overwater it. Plenty of seeds so you can grow, tear out, and then grow again.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: It DID NOT bring the SEEDS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for my nephew’s sixth birthday. I was setting it up with him so he could learn about plants and gardening when, to my surprise, the package had not brought ANY SEEDS. I looked and looked with my nephew to see if I had misplaced it and nothing. We finally concluded that the box never had the seed bag. So it was ultimately a failure even though we had fun assembling the terrarium (for no purpose whatsoever). Deeply disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Angélica

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great projectcto do with kids from 3 to 6 years and may be older. Looks good with easy to follow steps and the seeds grow.
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: So great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two one for my 8 year old daughter and one for my 4 year old nephew. They did them together and had so much fun. They are loving how fast it grew and they are doing such a great job watering it. This was a great idea and so easy to do with kids of all ages.. I’m currently looking for other ones so they can do this again they enjoyed it so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price....
customer_reviews.text: So it's a small plastic jar, some soil and rocks. Not sure it is worth $29, I can probably assemble the pieces together at a home depot for $5. The quality is also not great, the small plastic bottle for the water spritzer had a leak and the plastic on the terrarium is very thin and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: cleanmoto

customer_reviews.title: Great but for children.
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing. Easy to assemble and grew in 2 days. It was great as my 4 year old had a lesson on seeds and plants in April during quarantine and this was perfect for her to watch the plants grow.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

product_meta.title: Light-up Terrarium Kit for Kids with LED Light on Lid - Create Your Own Customized Mini Garden in a Jar That Glows at Night - Science Kits for Boys & Girls - Gardening Gifts for Kids - Children Toys
feature_bullets: WHAT IS A TERRARIUM? It is a miniature garden within a container that simulates a natural environment. So, let your child discover the beauty of nature by creating their own beautiful terrarium with this all-inclusive kit. Watch as it grows by day and glows at night with the innovative LED light under the lid.

GROWS BY DAY, GLOWS AT NIGHT: Beneath the lid, there is a built-in innovative LED light that transforms the experience into something magical. At night, just hit the small switch to turn on the light and watch how your terrarium turns into a gorgeous illuminated tabletop garden. You have to see it to believe it! The light can easily be recharged with the included Micro-USB cable.

KIT INCLUDES: Terrarium jar (4"x6"), light-up jar lid, Micro-USB charging cable, clear and easy step-by-step instruction booklet, vermiculite soil, blue sand, river rocks, wheatgrass and chia seeds, small bunny and mushroom miniatures, removable stickers for decoration, spray bottle, and wooden stick to aid in planting the seeds.

A FUN AND EDUCATIONAL GIFT FOR ALL AGES: It's not often that a science project can be fun and engaging, but this terrarium kit achieves both! It fascinates children as soon as they pull it out of the box. With the freedom to layer the rocks, sand, soil, and stickers as they please, every child is guaranteed to have a blast.

STEM.ORG AUTHENTICATED EDUCATIONAL PRODUCT: This product has been evaluated by STEM.org and has been authenticated to meet the highest standards of STEM learning. 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: Love it, or your money back! We're sure that the child will have a blast, but if you are not satisfied with the kit we'll refund you 100% of the money, no questions asked.
